snippet: Apps that block all ads are threatening some web publishers’ livelihoods, which in turn could threaten some content on the web.
abstract: Some web publishers are upset because ads on their sites cannot be viewed due to Apple's new ad-blocking apps on iOS 9; complexities of ad-blocking are brought to fore, as advertising underlies much of Internet.

byline.original: By KATIE BENNER and SYDNEY EMBER

lead_paragraph: Apps that block all ads are threatening some web publishers’ livelihoods, which in turn could threaten some content on the web.

headline.main: Enabling of Ad Blocking in Apple’s iOS 9 Prompts Backlash
headline.print_headline: Negative Side to Ad Blocking on Apple iOS 9
